declarations.description:
The feddback box provides a form to submit feedback of the user.
It can be used like any other form element, as it dispatches a submit event if the form is valid.
declarations.name: FeedbackBox

cssProperties.description: The width of the feedback box within the disturber.
cssProperties.name: --sab-feedback-box-width

cssProperties.description: The outer padding of the feedback box.
cssProperties.name: --sab-feedback-box-spacing

cssProperties.description: The spacing between the form elements.
cssProperties.name: --sab-feedback-box-form-element-spacing

examples:
## Closed feedback box
```html
<sab-feedback-box slogan="Ihr Feedback z채hlt!"></sab-feedback-box>
```

## Opened feedback box
```html
<sab-feedback-box aria-expanded="true" slogan="Ihr Feedback z채hlt!"></sab-feedback-box>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-feedback-box

The feddback box provides a form to submit feedback of the user.
It can be used like any other form element, as it dispatches a submit event if the form is valid.

## Examples

## Closed feedback box

```html
<sab-feedback-box slogan="Ihr Feedback z채hlt!"></sab-feedback-box>
```

## Opened feedback box

```html
<sab-feedback-box aria-expanded="true" slogan="Ihr Feedback z채hlt!"></sab-feedback-box>
```

## Properties

| Property          | Attribute       | Type                  | Default |
|-------------------|-----------------|-----------------------|---------|
| `disturberHeight` |                 | `string \| undefined` |         |
| `expanded`        | `aria-expanded` | `"true" \| "false"`   | "false" |
| `form`            |                 |                       |         |
| `formValid`       |                 | `boolean`             | false   |
| `slogan`          | `slogan`        | `string \| undefined` |         |

## Methods

| Method                  | Type                 |
|-------------------------|----------------------|
| `checkValidity`         | `(): any`            |
| `emitSubmitEvent`       | `(): void`           |
| `handleCloseClick`      | `(event: any): void` |
| `handleDisturberClick`  | `(): void`           |
| `handleInput`           | `(): void`           |
| `handleReset`           | `(): void`           |
| `handleSubmit`          | `(event: any): void` |
| `updateDisturberHeight` | `(): void`           |

## Events

| Event                     | Description                                      |
|---------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `sab-feedback-box:submit` | The submit event of the form if the form is valid. |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                                  | Description                                      |
|-------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `--sab-feedback-box-form-element-spacing` | The spacing between the form elements.           |
| `--sab-feedback-box-spacing`              | The outer padding of the feedback box.           |
| `--sab-feedback-box-width`                | The width of the feedback box within the disturber. |

declarations.description: A radio input element using the SAB style. Fully form aware.
declarations.name: InputRadio

cssProperties.description: The font size of the label.

cssProperties.description: The leading distance of the label to the input.
cssProperties.name: --sab-input-radio-label-spacing

cssProperties.description: The size of the radio input.
cssProperties.name: --sab-input-radio-size

cssProperties.description: The background color of the radio input.
cssProperties.name: --sab-input-radio-background

cssProperties.description: The border color of the radio input.
cssProperties.name: --sab-input-radio-border

cssProperties.description: The fill color of the radio input when not checked.
cssProperties.name: --sab-input-radio-passive-color

cssProperties.description: The fill color of the radio input when checked.
cssProperties.name: --sab-input-radio-active-color

examples:
## With optinal label
```html
<sab-input-radio label="With optional label"></sab-input-radio>
```

## With initial value
```html
<sab-input-radio checked label="With optional initial value"></sab-input-radio>
```

## Used within a form
```html
<form>
  <sab-input-radio label="Fully form enabled component"></sab-input-radio>
  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
  <button type="reset">Reset</button>
</form>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-input-radio

A radio input element using the SAB style. Fully form aware.

## Examples

## With optinal label

```html
<sab-input-radio label="With optional label"></sab-input-radio>
```

## With initial value

```html
<sab-input-radio checked label="With optional initial value"></sab-input-radio>
```

## Used within a form

```html
<form>
  <sab-input-radio label="Fully form enabled component"></sab-input-radio>
  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
  <button type="reset">Reset</button>
</form>
```

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Type                  | Default |
|------------|------------|-----------------------|---------|
| `checked`  | `checked`  | `boolean`             | false   |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | `boolean`             | false   |
| `label`    | `label`    | `string \| undefined` |         |
| `name`     | `name`     | `string`              | "radio" |
| `required` | `required` | `boolean`             | false   |
| `value`    | `value`    | `string \| undefined` | "on"    |

## Methods

| Method              | Type                 |
|---------------------|----------------------|
| `checkValidity`     | `(): boolean`        |
| `formResetCallback` | `(): void`           |
| `handleInput`       | `(event: any): void` |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                          | Description                                      |
|-----------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `--sab-input-radio-active-color`  | The fill color of the radio input when checked.  |
| `--sab-input-radio-background`    | The background color of the radio input.         |
| `--sab-input-radio-border`        | The border color of the radio input.             |
| `--sab-input-radio-label-size`    | The font size of the label.                      |
| `--sab-input-radio-label-spacing` | The leading distance of the label to the input.  |
| `--sab-input-radio-passive-color` | The fill color of the radio input when not checked. |
| `--sab-input-radio-size`          | The size of the radio input.                     |

## Used within a form

<form>

  <button type="reset">Reset</button>

declarations.readme:
# sab-input-text

A text input element using the SAB style. Fully form aware.
Can display multilie text (textarea) if configured to do so.

## Examples

## With optional label

```html
<sab-input-text label="With optional label"></sab-input-text>
```

## With optional initial value

```html
<sab-input-text label="With optional initial value" value="Foo"></sab-input-text>
```

## Multiline

```html
<sab-input-text multiline label="With multiline value"></sab-input-text>
```

## Used within a form

```html
<form>
  <sab-input-text label="Fully form enabled component"></sab-input-text>
  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
  <button type="reset">Reset</button>
</form>
```

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Type                  | Default |
|-------------|-------------|-----------------------|---------|
| `disabled`  | `disabled`  | `boolean`             | false   |
| `input`     |             |                       |         |
| `label`     | `label`     | `string \| undefined` |         |
| `multiline` | `multiline` | `boolean`             | false   |
| `name`      | `name`      | `string`              | "text"  |
| `required`  | `required`  | `boolean`             | false   |
| `value`     | `value`     | `string \| undefined` |         |

## Methods

| Method              | Type                 |
|---------------------|----------------------|
| `checkValidity`     | `(): boolean`        |
| `formResetCallback` | `(): void`           |
| `handleInput`       | `(event: any): void` |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                         | Description                                  |
|----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|
| `--sab-input-text-background`    | The background color of the element.         |
| `--sab-input-text-border`        | The border color of the element.             |
| `--sab-input-text-color`         | The font color of the input element.         |
| `--sab-input-text-label-size`    | The font size of the label.                  |
| `--sab-input-text-label-spacing` | The spacing between the label and the input. |
| `--sab-input-text-radius`        | The border radius of the element.            |
| `--sab-input-text-spacing`       | The inner spacing of the input element.      |

declarations.description: A radio menu element using the SAB style. Fully form aware.
declarations.name: RadioMenu

cssProperties.description: The font size of the label.
cssProperties.name: --sab-radio-menu-label-size

cssProperties.description: The spacing between label and radio buttons.
cssProperties.name: --sab-radio-menu-label-spacing

cssProperties.description: The spacing between the radio buttons.
cssProperties.name: --sab-radio-menu-option-spacing

slots.description: The default slot. Pass the radio buttons here.

examples:
## With optional label
```html
<sab-radio-menu label="With optional label">
  <sab-input-radio label="foo" value="foo"></sab-input-radio>
  <sab-input-radio label="bar" value="bar"></sab-input-radio>
  <sab-input-radio label="baz" value="baz"></sab-input-radio>
</sab-radio-menu>
```

## With optional initial value
```html
<sab-radio-menu label="With optional initial value">
  <sab-input-radio label="foo" value="foo"></sab-input-radio>
  <sab-input-radio checked label="bar" value="bar"></sab-input-radio>
  <sab-input-radio label="baz" value="baz"></sab-input-radio>
</sab-radio-menu>
```

## Used within a form
```html
<form>
  <sab-radio-menu label="Fully form enabled component">
    <sab-input-radio label="foo" value="foo"></sab-input-radio>
    <sab-input-radio label="bar" value="bar"></sab-input-radio>
    <sab-input-radio label="baz" value="baz"></sab-input-radio>
  </sab-radio-menu>
  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
  <button type="reset">Reset</button>
</form>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-radio-menu

A radio menu element using the SAB style. Fully form aware.

## Examples

## With optional label

```html
<sab-radio-menu label="With optional label">
  <sab-input-radio label="foo" value="foo"></sab-input-radio>
  <sab-input-radio label="bar" value="bar"></sab-input-radio>
  <sab-input-radio label="baz" value="baz"></sab-input-radio>
</sab-radio-menu>
```

## With optional initial value

```html
<sab-radio-menu label="With optional initial value">
  <sab-input-radio label="foo" value="foo"></sab-input-radio>
  <sab-input-radio checked label="bar" value="bar"></sab-input-radio>
  <sab-input-radio label="baz" value="baz"></sab-input-radio>
</sab-radio-menu>
```

## Used within a form

```html
<form>
  <sab-radio-menu label="Fully form enabled component">
    <sab-input-radio label="foo" value="foo"></sab-input-radio>
    <sab-input-radio label="bar" value="bar"></sab-input-radio>
    <sab-input-radio label="baz" value="baz"></sab-input-radio>
  </sab-radio-menu>
  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
  <button type="reset">Reset</button>
</form>
```

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Type                  | Default      |
|------------|------------|-----------------------|--------------|
| `disabled` | `disabled` | `boolean`             | false        |
| `label`    | `label`    | `string \| undefined` |              |
| `name`     | `name`     | `string`              | "radio-menu" |
| `required` | `required` | `boolean`             | false        |
| `value`    | `value`    | `string \| undefined` |              |

## Methods

| Method              | Type                 |
|---------------------|----------------------|
| `checkValidity`     | `(): boolean`        |
| `formResetCallback` | `(): void`           |
| `handleInput`       | `(event: any): void` |
| `handleSlotChange`  | `(): void`           |

## Slots

| Name | Description                                    |
|------|------------------------------------------------|
|      | The default slot. Pass the radio buttons here. |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                          | Description                                  |
|-----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------|
| `--sab-radio-menu-label-size`     | The font size of the label.                  |
| `--sab-radio-menu-label-spacing`  | The spacing between label and radio buttons. |
| `--sab-radio-menu-option-spacing` | The spacing between the radio buttons.       |

declarations.readme:
# sab-rating

A rating input element showing several smileys to collect feedback. Fully form aware.

## Examples

## With optional label

```html
<sab-rating label="With optional label"></sab-rating>
```

## With optional initial value

```html
<sab-rating label="With optional initial value" value="good"></sab-rating>
```

## Used within a form

```html
<form>
  <sab-rating label="Fully form enabled component"></sab-rating>
  <button type="submit">Submit</button>
  <button type="reset">Reset</button>
</form>
```

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Type                  | Default  |
|------------|------------|-----------------------|----------|
| `disabled` | `disabled` | `boolean`             | false    |
| `label`    | `label`    | `string \| undefined` |          |
| `name`     | `name`     | `string`              | "rating" |
| `required` | `required` | `boolean`             | false    |
| `value`    | `value`    | `string \| undefined` |          |

## Methods

| Method              | Type                 |
|---------------------|----------------------|
| `checkValidity`     | `(): boolean`        |
| `formResetCallback` | `(): void`           |
| `handleInput`       | `(event: any): void` |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                     | Description                                      |
|------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `--sab-rating-emoji-spacing` | The spacing between the rating icons.            |
| `--sab-rating-label-size`    | The font size of the label.                      |
| `--sab-rating-label-spacing` | The spacing between the label and the rating icons. |

declarations.description: A carousel component that allows to display multiple items at once and to circularily slide through them.
declarations.name: Carousel

cssProperties.description: The duration of the slide animation.
cssProperties.name: --sab-carousel-animation-duration

slots.description: The items to be displayed in the carousel.

members.name: autoplayInterval
members.description: Once autoplay is enabled, this property defines the interval in milliseconds between the automatic slide animations.

members.name: visibleIndex
members.description: The currently visible index of the carousel. Can be used to initialize the carousel with a specific item.

members.name: visibleAtOnce
members.description: The amount of items that should be visible at once.

members.name: slideAtOnce
members.description: The amount of items that should be slid at once.

members.name: showPrevious
members.description: Slide to the previous set of items.

members.name: showNext
members.description: Slide to the next set of items.

attributes.name: autoplay-interval
attributes.description: Once autoplay is enabled, this property defines the interval in milliseconds between the automatic slide animations.

attributes.name: visible-index
attributes.description: The currently visible index of the carousel. Can be used to initialize the carousel with a specific item.

attributes.name: visible-at-once
attributes.description: The amount of items that should be visible at once.

attributes.name: slide-at-once
attributes.description: The amount of items that should be slid at once.

examples:
Double items ```html
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9
```

Autoplay ```html
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-carousel A carousel component that allows to display multiple items at once and to circularily slide through them. ## Examples Double items ```html
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9
``` Autoplay ```html
1
2
3
4
5
6
7
8
9
``` ## Properties | Property | Attribute | Type | Default | Description | |--------------------|---------------------|-------------------------------|---------|--------------------------------------------------| | `autoplay` | `autoplay` | `boolean` | false | Enables the automatic slide animation. | | `autoplayInterval` | `autoplay-interval` | `number` | 3000 | Once autoplay is enabled, this property defines the interval in milliseconds between the automatic slide animations. | | `isAnimating` | `is-animating` | `boolean` | false | | | `slide` | `slide` | `"ltr" \| "rtl" \| undefined` | | | | `slideAtOnce` | `slide-at-once` | `number` | 1 | The amount of items that should be slid at once. | | `visibleAtOnce` | `visible-at-once` | `number` | 1 | The amount of items that should be visible at once. | | `visibleIndex` | `visible-index` | `number` | 0 | The currently visible index of the carousel. Can be used to initialize the carousel with a specific item. | ## Methods | Method | Type | Description | |-----------------|------------|---------------------------------------| | `showNext` | `(): void` | Slide to the next set of items. | | `showPrevious` | `(): void` | Slide to the previous set of items. | | `startAutoplay` | `(): void` | Starts the automatic slide animation. | | `stopAutoplay` | `(): void` | Stops the automatic slide animation. | ## Slots | Name | Description | |------|--------------------------------------------| | | The items to be displayed in the carousel. | ## CSS Custom Properties | Property | Description | |-------------------------------------|--------------------------------------| | `--sab-carousel-animation-duration` | The duration of the slide animation. |

declarations.description:
Submits arbitrary form data to sentry as user feedback.
Optionally, the form data can be used to derive tags to be visualized within the Sentry dashboard.
declarations.name: FeedbackSentrySubmit
examples:
## Submitting form data to sentry
```html
<sab-feedback-sentry-submit
  sentry-dsn="https://d1f5efac5516485798a2751f4b86cc77@o4504722194432000.ingest.sentry.io/4504726558146560"
  sentry-organization-slug="zalari"
  sentry-project-slug="online-portal"
  sentry-tags="category rating"
  submit-event-name="sab-feedback-box:submit"
  submitter-email="noreply@sab.sachsen.de"
  submitter-name="Anonym"
>
  <sab-feedback-box slogan="Ihr Feedback z채hlt!"></sab-feedback-box>
</sab-feedback-sentry-submit>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-feedback-sentry-submit

Submits arbitrary form data to sentry as user feedback.
Optionally, the form data can be used to derive tags to be visualized within the Sentry dashboard.

## Example

## Submitting form data to sentry

```html
<sab-feedback-sentry-submit
  sentry-dsn="https://d1f5efac5516485798a2751f4b86cc77@o4504722194432000.ingest.sentry.io/4504726558146560"
  sentry-organization-slug="zalari"
  sentry-project-slug="online-portal"
  sentry-tags="category rating"
  submit-event-name="sab-feedback-box:submit"
  submitter-email="noreply@sab.sachsen.de"
  submitter-name="Anonym"
>
  <sab-feedback-box slogan="Ihr Feedback z채hlt!"></sab-feedback-box>
</sab-feedback-sentry-submit>
```

## Properties

| Property                 | Attribute                  | Type     | Default                        |
|--------------------------|----------------------------|----------|--------------------------------|
| `commentKeySeparator`    | `comment-key-separator`    | `string` | ": "                           |
| `commentLineSeparator`   | `comment-line-separator`   | `string` | "\n"                           |
| `handleSubmit`           |                            |          | "this.submitSentry.bind(this)" |
| `sentryDsn`              | `sentry-dsn`               | `string` |                                |
| `sentryOrganizationSlug` | `sentry-organization-slug` | `string` |                                |
| `sentryProjectSlug`      | `sentry-project-slug`      | `string` |                                |
| `sentryTags`             | `sentry-tags`              | `object` | []                             |
| `submitEventName`        | `submit-event-name`        | `string` | "submit"                       |
| `submitterEmail`         | `submitter-email`          | `string` | "noreply@sab.sachsen.de"       |
| `submitterName`          | `submitter-name`           | `string` | "Anonymous"                    |

## Methods

| Method            | Type                                             |
|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `prepareComments` | `(formData: any, keySeparator?: string, lineSeparator?: string): string` |
| `prepareContext`  | `(formData: any): any`                           |
| `submitSentry`    | `(event: any): any`                              |

declarations.description:
A navigational component that can be used to trigger actions or to navigate to another page.
Thus, it can be used as a button or as a link, by passing the optional `href` attribute.
declarations.name: Button

cssProperties.description: The background color of the button when it is not active.
cssProperties.name: --sab-button-passive-background

cssProperties.description: The border color of the button when it is not active.
cssProperties.name: --sab-button-passive-border-color

cssProperties.description: The text color of the button when it is not active.
cssProperties.name: --sab-button-passive-color

cssProperties.description: The background color of the button when it is hovered.
cssProperties.name: --sab-button-hover-background

cssProperties.description: The border color of the button when it is hovered.
cssProperties.name: --sab-button-hover-border-color

cssProperties.description: The text color of the button when it is hovered.
cssProperties.name: --sab-button-hover-color

examples:
## Fixed width w/o ellipsis
```html
<sab-button style="width: 220px">Zu den F철rderprogrammen</sab-button>
<sab-button nowrap style="width: 220px">Zu den F철rderprogrammen</sab-button>
```

## Button as submit
```html
<form>
 <sab-button type="submit">Absenden</sab-button>
</form>
```

## Dark button
```html
<sab-button>Zu den Ausschreibungen</sab-button>
<sab-button disabled>Zu den Ausschreibungen</sab-button>
<sab-button stretched>Zur Kundenstory</sab-button>
```

## Button as link
```html
<sab-button href="https://www.sab.sachsen.de">Zu den Ausschreibungen</sab-button>
```

## Light button
```html
<sab-button color="light">Zu den Ausschreibungen</sab-button>
<sab-button color="light" disabled>Zu den Ausschreibungen</sab-button>
<sab-button color="light" stretched>Zur Kundenstory</sab-button>
```

## Mono button ```html
Zu den Ausschreibungen Zu den Ausschreibungen Zur Kundenstory
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-button A navigational component that can be used to trigger actions or to navigate to another page. Thus, it can be used as a button or as a link, by passing the optional `href` attribute. ## Examples ## Fixed width w/o ellipsis ```html Zu den F철rderprogrammen Zu den F철rderprogrammen ``` ## Button as submit ```html
Absenden
``` ## Dark button ```html Zu den Ausschreibungen Zu den Ausschreibungen Zur Kundenstory ``` ## Button as link ```html Zu den Ausschreibungen ``` ## Light button ```html Zu den Ausschreibungen Zu den Ausschreibungen Zur Kundenstory ``` ## Mono button ```html
Zu den Ausschreibungen Zu den Ausschreibungen Zur Kundenstory
``` ## Button with custom styles ```html Zu den Ausschreibungen ``` ## Properties | Property | Attribute | Type | Default | |-------------|-------------|--------------------------------------------------|----------| | `color` | `color` | `"dark" \| "light" \| "mono"` | "dark" | | `disabled` | `disabled` | `boolean` | false | | `href` | `href` | `string \| undefined` | | | `nowrap` | `nowrap` | `boolean` | false | | `stretched` | `stretched` | `boolean` | false | | `target` | `target` | `"_self" \| "_blank" \| "_parent" \| "_top" \| undefined` | | | `type` | `type` | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"` | "button" | ## Methods | Method | Type | |---------------------|------------| | `handleButtonClick` | `(): void` | ## Slots | Name | Description | |------|------------------| | | The default slot | ## CSS Custom Properties | Property | Description | |-------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------| | `--sab-button-hover-background` | The background color of the button when it is hovered. | | `--sab-button-hover-border-color` | The border color of the button when it is hovered. | | `--sab-button-hover-color` | The text color of the button when it is hovered. | | `--sab-button-passive-background` | The background color of the button when it is not active. | | `--sab-button-passive-border-color` | The border color of the button when it is not active. | | `--sab-button-passive-color` | The text color of the button when it is not active. |

examples:
## Dark disturber
```html
<sab-disturber>St철rer Lorem ipsum dolor</sab-disturber>
```

## Light disturber

<sab-disturber color="light">St철rer Lorem ipsum dolor</sab-disturber>

## Mono disturber

<sab-disturber color="mono">St철rer Lorem ipsum dolor</sab-disturber>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-disturber

The Disturber component can be used to show some important information to the user outside the layout flow.
It should be used wisely and not be paired with another instance of itself.

## Examples

## Dark disturber

```html
<sab-disturber>St철rer Lorem ipsum dolor</sab-disturber>
```

## Light disturber

```html
<sab-disturber color="light">St철rer Lorem ipsum dolor</sab-disturber>
```

## Mono disturber

```html
<sab-disturber color="mono">St철rer Lorem ipsum dolor</sab-disturber>
```

## Disturber with custom style

```html
<sab-disturber style="
  --sab-disturber-passive-background: cyan;
  --sab-disturber-passive-color: #333;
  --sab-disturber-hover-background: magenta;
  --sab-disturber-hover-color: #fff;
  --sab-disturber-hover-rotation: 5deg;
">
 St철rer Lorem ipsum dolor
</sab-disturber>
```

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Type                          | Default |
|----------|-----------|-------------------------------|---------|
| `color`  | `color`   | `"dark" \| "light" \| "mono"` | "dark"  |

## Slots

| Name    | Description                                      |
|---------|--------------------------------------------------|
|         | The default slot.                                |
| `extra` | An additional slot to be used to toggle contents. |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                              | Description                                      |
|---------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `--sab-disturber-hover-background`    | The background color of the component when it is hovered. |
| `--sab-disturber-hover-color`         | The text color of the component when it is hovered. |
| `--sab-disturber-hover-font-size`     | The font size of the component when it is hovered. |
| `--sab-disturber-hover-font-weight`   | The font weight of the component when it is hovered. |
| `--sab-disturber-hover-radius`        | The border radius of the component when it is hovered. |
| `--sab-disturber-hover-rotation`      | The rotation of the component when it is hovered. |
| `--sab-disturber-hover-size`          | The size of the component when it is hovered.    |
| `--sab-disturber-passive-background`  | The background color of the component when it is not active. |
| `--sab-disturber-passive-color`       | The text color of the component when it is not active. |
| `--sab-disturber-passive-font-size`   | The font size of the component when it is not active. |
| `--sab-disturber-passive-font-weight` | The font weight of the component when it is not active. |
| `--sab-disturber-passive-radius`      | The border radius of the component when it is not active. |
| `--sab-disturber-passive-rotation`    | The rotation of the component when it is not active. |
| `--sab-disturber-passive-size`        | The size of the component when it is not active. |

declarations.description:
The Icon component can be used to display an icon from the sab-icons font.
Just pass the name of the icon as the name property.
declarations.name: Icon

cssProperties.description: The size of the icon.
cssProperties.name: --sab-icon-size

examples:
## Example icon
```html
<sab-icon name="close" style="--sab-icon-size: 32px"></sab-icon>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-icon

The Icon component can be used to display an icon from the sab-icons font.
Just pass the name of the icon as the name property.

## Example

## Example icon

```html
<sab-icon name="close" style="--sab-icon-size: 32px"></sab-icon>
```

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Type                                             |
|----------|-----------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `name`   | `name`    | `"chat" \| "close" \| "dismiss" \| "download" \| "fax" \| "facebook" \| "facebook-contact" \| "hotline" \| "info" \| "intranet" \| "icon-speaker" \| "icon-info" \| "intranet2" \| "jumplink" \| ... 33 more ... \| "zoom"` |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property          | Description           |
|-------------------|-----------------------|
| `--sab-icon-size` | The size of the icon. |

declarations.description: Can be used to display an icon as an undecorated button.
declarations.name: IconButton

cssProperties.description: The spacing around the icon within the button.
cssProperties.name: --sab-icon-button-spacing

examples:
## Example icon button
```html
<sab-icon-button style="--sab-icon-size: 32px; --sab-icon-button-spacing: 4px;">
  <sab-icon name="close"></sab-icon>
</sab-icon-button>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-icon-button

Can be used to display an icon as an undecorated button.

## Example

## Example icon button

```html
<sab-icon-button style="--sab-icon-size: 32px; --sab-icon-button-spacing: 4px;">
  <sab-icon name="close"></sab-icon>
</sab-icon-button>
```

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Type                              | Default  |
|----------|-----------|-----------------------------------|----------|
| `type`   | `type`    | `"button" \| "submit" \| "reset"` | "button" |

## Slots

| Name | Description       |
|------|-------------------|
|      | The default slot. |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                    | Description                                    |
|-----------------------------|------------------------------------------------|
| `--sab-icon-button-spacing` | The spacing around the icon within the button. |

declarations.description:
A single emoji rating element.
Must be configured with the `level` attribute.
declarations.name: RatingEmoji

cssProperties.description: The size of the emoji.
cssProperties.name: --sab-rating-emoji-size

cssProperties.description: The background color of the emoji.
cssProperties.name: --sab-rating-emoji-background

cssProperties.description: The foreground color of the emoji.
cssProperties.name: --sab-rating-emoji-foreground

examples:
## All rating emojis
```html
<sab-rating-emoji level="like"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji level="good"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji level="medium"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji level="bad"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji level="dislike"></sab-rating-emoji>
```

## Custom colored rating emojis
```html
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="like"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="good"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="medium"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="bad"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="dislike"></sab-rating-emoji>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-rating-emoji

A single emoji rating element.
Must be configured with the `level` attribute.

## Examples

## All rating emojis

```html
<sab-rating-emoji level="like"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji level="good"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji level="medium"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji level="bad"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji level="dislike"></sab-rating-emoji>
```

## Custom colored rating emojis

```html
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="like"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="good"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="medium"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="bad"></sab-rating-emoji>
<sab-rating-emoji style="--sab-rating-emoji-background: #d9d9d9; --sab-rating-emoji-foreground: #878787;" level="dislike"></sab-rating-emoji>
```

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Type                                             |
|----------|-----------|--------------------------------------------------|
| `level`  | `level`   | `"like" \| "good" \| "medium" \| "bad" \| "dislike"` |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                        | Description                        |
|---------------------------------|------------------------------------|
| `--sab-rating-emoji-background` | The background color of the emoji. |
| `--sab-rating-emoji-foreground` | The foreground color of the emoji. |
| `--sab-rating-emoji-size`       | The size of the emoji.             |

declarations.readme:
# sab-adbox

This widget component can be used to display an advertisement box.

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Type                  |
|------------|------------|-----------------------|
| `caption`  | `caption`  | `string \| undefined` |
| `headline` | `headline` | `string \| undefined` |
| `label`    | `label`    | `string \| undefined` |
| `link`     | `link`     | `string \| undefined` |

## Slots

| Name | Description       |
|------|-------------------|
|      | The default slot. |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                     | Description                        |
|------------------------------|------------------------------------|
| `--sab-adbox-background`     | The background color of the adbox. |
| `--sab-adbox-color`          | The text color of the adbox.       |
| `--sab-adbox-headline-color` | The headline color of the adbox.   |
| `--sab-adbox-shadow`         | The shadow color of the adbox.     |

examples:

mit dem F철rderprogramm "Digitalisierung Zuschuss"
 ```
declarations.readme:
# sab-adbox-wrapper This widget component orchestrates multiple adboxes. ## Example ## Example adbox wrapper ```html

Baufinanzierung mit der SAB

Familienwohnen mit 0,75% eff. Jahreszins

Investieren in Sachsen

mit dem GRW-Zuschuss & den SAB-Sachsenkredien

Investition in die Zukunft

mit dem F철rderprogramm "Digitalisierung Zuschuss"
 ``` ## Properties | Property | Attribute | Type | Default | |------------|------------|-----------------------|---------| | `close` | | | | | `headline` | `headline` | `string \| undefined` | "" | | `visible` | `visible` | `boolean` | true | ## Methods | Method | Type | |---------------|------------| | `handleClose` | `(): void` | ## Slots | Name | Description | |------|-------------------------------------------------| | | The default slot getting the adboxes passed in. | ## CSS Custom Properties | Property | Description | |----------------------------------|--------------------------------------------| | `--sab-adbox-wrapper-background` | The background color of the adbox wrapper. | | `--sab-adbox-wrapper-color` | The text color of the adbox wrapper. |

declarations.description:
A convenience component that can be used to select a language.
Shows either a dropdown or an inline list of links generated from a given set of locales.
declarations.name: LanguageSelect
examples:
## Inline
```html
<sab-language-select
  display="inline"
  current-locale="en_US"
  language-path="/c/portal/update_language?p_l_id=1433&redirect=%2Ffoerderportal&languageId=%s"
  supported-locales="cs_CZ de_DE en_US es_ES fr_FR"
></sab-language-select>
```

## Dropdown
```html
<sab-language-select
  display="dropdown"
  current-locale="de"
  supported-locales="cs de en es fr"
></sab-language-select>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-language-select

A convenience component that can be used to select a language.
Shows either a dropdown or an inline list of links generated from a given set of locales.

## Examples

## Inline

```html
<sab-language-select
  display="inline"
  current-locale="en_US"
  language-path="/c/portal/update_language?p_l_id=1433&redirect=%2Ffoerderportal&languageId=%s"
  supported-locales="cs_CZ de_DE en_US es_ES fr_FR"
></sab-language-select>
```

## Dropdown

```html
<sab-language-select
  display="dropdown"
  current-locale="de"
  supported-locales="cs de en es fr"
></sab-language-select>
```

## Properties

| Property                  | Attribute                   | Type                     | Default          |
|---------------------------|-----------------------------|--------------------------|------------------|
| `currentLocale`           | `current-locale`            | `string \| undefined`    |                  |
| `display`                 | `display`                   | `"inline" \| "dropdown"` | "inline"         |
| `languagePath`            | `language-path`             | `string`                 | "/%s/index.html" |
| `languagePathPlaceholder` | `language-path-placeholder` | `string`                 | "%s"             |
| `supportedLocales`        | `supported-locales`         | `object`                 | []               |

## Methods

| Method                 | Type                       |
|------------------------|----------------------------|
| `getLabelForLocale`    | `(locale: string): string` |
| `getPathForLocale`     | `(locale: string): any`    |
| `handleLanguageChange` | `(event: any): void`       |

declarations.description: A teaser element to be used e.g. inside a carousel.
declarations.name: Teaser

cssProperties.description: The background color of the teaser.
cssProperties.name: --sab-teaser-background

cssProperties.description: The text color of the teaser.
cssProperties.name: --sab-teaser-color

slots.description: A button to be displayed in the teaser.
slots.name: action

examples:
## Whole teaser is linked
```html
<sab-teaser headline="Some Teaser"
  href="link.html"
  src="https://picsum.photos/id/9/5000/3269.jpg"
>
</sab-teaser>
```

## Teaser carries a button
Using the action slot shallnot be mixed with linked teasers!
```html
<sab-teaser headline="Some Teaser"
  src="https://picsum.photos/id/9/5000/3269.jpg"
>
  <sab-button slot="action" color="mono" stretched href="link.html">
    Button
  </sab-button>
</sab-teaser>
```
declarations.readme:
# sab-teaser

A teaser element to be used e.g. inside a carousel.

## Examples

## Whole teaser is linked

```html
<sab-teaser headline="Some Teaser"
  href="link.html"
  src="https://picsum.photos/id/9/5000/3269.jpg"
>
</sab-teaser>
```

## Teaser carries a button
Using the action slot shallnot be mixed with linked teasers!

```html
<sab-teaser headline="Some Teaser"
  src="https://picsum.photos/id/9/5000/3269.jpg"
>
  <sab-button slot="action" color="mono" stretched href="link.html">
    Button
  </sab-button>
</sab-teaser>
```

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Type                  |
|------------|------------|-----------------------|
| `headline` | `headline` | `string`              |
| `href`     | `href`     | `string \| undefined` |
| `src`      | `src`      | `string \| undefined` |
| `text`     | `text`     | `string \| undefined` |

## Slots

| Name     | Description                             |
|----------|-----------------------------------------|
| `action` | A button to be displayed in the teaser. |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                  | Description                         |
|---------------------------|-------------------------------------|
| `--sab-teaser-background` | The background color of the teaser. |
| `--sab-teaser-color`      | The text color of the teaser.       |
